text: Aap farmaiye kay albatta meray rab ney sirf haram kiya hai inn tamam fahash baaton ko jo ailaaniya hain aur jo posheeda hain aur her gunah ki baat ko aur na haq kissi per zulm kerney ko aur iss baat ko kay tum Allah kay sath kissi aisi cheez ko shareek thehrao jiss ki Allah ney koi sanad nazil nahi ki aur iss baat ko kay tum log Allah kay zimmay aisi baat laga do jiss ko tum jantay nahi
